text.tspan: How much we think we spend on healthcare vs. how much we actually do
Perception and actual health expenditure measured as a share of GDP. Data for 2016.
How much we actually spend on health expenditure (% of GDP)
How much we think we spend on health expenditure (% of GDP)
Source: Ipsos MORI Perils of Perception 2016
